features: EVERYDAY HOME ESSENTIAL — A dusty home is the worst nightmare that nobody wants to go through — make housework easy and hassle-free, clean efficiently and effortlessly with our sweeping broom, and remove dirt, debris, and dust without scratching your wooden floors or damaging your walls — thoughtful cleaning system!

SOFT BRISTLES, WIDE DESIGN — Strong yet ultra-soft bristles on a 13” wide head help you swipe more surface area at once, giving your dust cleaning broom the power to clean better with every glide and tiring you less, while gliding with extreme ease on almost all surfaces (including ceramics, wooden floor, linoleum, marble, etc). The bristle broom can be used both for outdoor sweeping (patio) as well as indoor sweeping.

ADJUSTABLE & STURDY METAL HANDLE — The handle of the bristle broom is 50” thick for a heavy-duty performance, and can be easily set to different lengths between 31”-50” for cleaning different parts of the home like high ceilings, walls, shelves, and lofts, while the metal handle of the plastic soft broom is fitted with a plastic grip that provides an ergonomic and comfortable grip. The extended length also prevents need to bend, thus alleviating chances of any back pain.

DURABLE & LONG-LASTING — Made with premium-quality polypropylene, the floor cleaning broom is resistant to chemicals, oil and grease, while the resilient plastic head on a heavy-duty metal handle will not bend or break easily even with rough and tough cleaning — A MUST HAVE FOR EVERY HOME, OFFICE, SCHOOL, GARAGE, CAFÉ, RESTAURANT, AND MORE!

PROMISE OF QUALITY — Customer satisfaction is our primary aim, which is why we provide you with worry-free quality assurance with our dust cleaning broom. We will either replace the product or provide you with a refund with no further questions asked! However, we are quite sure that our floor-sweeping brush will not fail to please you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bang for the buck
reviews.reviewText: I ordered, a second one, and might even order a few more for rooms that people are too lazy to walk to go get a broom :D It's got a nice rigid sweep to it, and with it not being overly wide, it's good in tight spots. The only downside i'm seeing, they are a little loose after tightening the pole. You just give it a little twist, not a big deal. I've worked a lot of dirty jobs in my life, and I like that it's lightweight, and has guts where it's needed (the bristles)! If you need a reliable workhorse on a budget, this is a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I'm loving this broom. It sweeps so much better than the Libman broom I have. The bristles are firm and strong, yet still have the flexibility to get underneath stuff and into the corners. The bristles are very durable and keep their shape. I have other brooms with bristles that have deformed after multiple uses, but this one is keeping its shape very nicely. It's much more efficient at picking up dirt, so I don't have to go back over the floor as many times. The head of it is angled, which helps get in the corners and under the baseboards in my garage. It also works great to sweep the tops of the baseboards in the garage. I think the handle is the best part of the entire broom. It's got 3 extension levels, so you can adjust based on your height and your sweeping needs. I love that you can even use it as a hand broom, once the poles are adjusted. The poles are made of heavy duty metal that's very firm, so they won't bend. The extension attachments are made with thick ABS plastic, so there's no worry about them breaking. The metal poles screw into the attachment for a firm fit. Even though there are multiple extensions there is no give in the pole while using. The handle is larger with a nice comfortable grip. It's even got a hole at the top if you want to hang it for storage. This is a great quality broom and the price is very economical, especially for this high quality of a broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good for sweeping, not super sturdy
reviews.reviewText: The broom was easy to set up and works well when cleaning. I like that it has the extendable feature, but I don't seem to use it much. I assume it would be good for someone who needs to take their broom on the go though.The broom does a fine job with cleaning, but my issue is actually the feature that I also liked it for. It seems to get loose and makes the broom less sturdy. It doesn't fall apart, but I find myself constantly tightening it. Since I don't need to use this feature much, I think I would prefer just having a regular broom. Sweeping isn't fun, but its a bit less fun when you have to keep tightening up your loose broom.Overall its a decent broom that gets the job done, I just wouldn't say its the "strongest," as its advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice broom
reviews.reviewText: I like this Broom. It’s very nice and light and the price is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Strong but YES it does unscrew
reviews.reviewText: So, I bought this because I get tons of spider webs out on my back yard fences, and I needed something relatively strong and relatively flexible. It works brilliantly but no matter how hard you twist the handle it all comes undone. I am going to have to use super glue to keep it from untwisting. Like others have said it really does start to untwist with hardly any force at all no matter how hard you tighten it.I am not going to need it to come apart since it will not be traveling anywhere with me, and I have plenty of room to store it. Will update once it makes it past a season outside.I did use it to sweep my pavers in the front and it worked really well. I might get another one for out there since it is a pretty decent sweeper. I get rid of my old straw broom... it has very little sweeping power these days. haha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very handy broom
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to assemble, and I'm pleased with how well it works. Making my patio sweeping a lot easier now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: The broom is great and well built. The handle comes in pieces that you screw together. That part is easy. The part I don't like is that, maybe because I just am not strong enough, as I'm sweeping away, the parts I've screwed together keep coming loose, so I have to keep tightening them. I figure if I have to I can always glue them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bristles are a bit thin for use outdoors
reviews.reviewText: I was kind of surprised how floppy the bristles on this are. I will often have to sweep over the same area multiple times, as it leaves a decent amount of debris behind. On the plus side, it is fairly durable and I haven’t noticed any wear after a few months of use outside. It does come loose after a while, so you will find yourself having to twist it back it place after almost every sweeping session.
Buen producto, se afloja un poco, pero..
We love this broom, it is light & easy to use & is great for sweeping the leaves from the crevasses in our deck. ++++
No es tan rigido para exterior, interior funciona bien. Esperaba mas de uso rudo
